label: Author
desc: party who authored the resource

label: Co Author
desc: party who jointly authors the resource

label: Collaborator
desc: party who assists with the generation of the resource other than the principal investigator

label: Contributor
desc: party contributing to the resource

label: Custodian
desc: party that accepts accountability and responsibility for the resource and ensures appropriate care and maintenance of the resource

label: Distributor
desc: party who distributes the resource

label: Editor
desc: party who reviewed or modified the resource to improve the content

label: Funder
desc: party providing monetary support for the resource

label: Mediator
desc: a class of entity that mediates access to the resource and for whom the resource is intended or useful

label: Originator
desc: party who created the resource

label: Owner
desc: party that owns the resource

label: Point Of Contact
desc: party who can be contacted for acquiring knowledge about or acquisition of the resource

label: Principal Investigator
desc: key party responsible for gathering information and conducting research

label: Processor
desc: party who has processed the data in a manner such that the resource has been modified

label: Publisher
desc: party who published the resource

label: Resource Provider
desc: party that supplies the resource

label: Rights Holder
desc: party owning or managing rights over the resource

label: Sponsor
desc: party who speaks for the resource

label: Stakeholder
desc: party who has an interest in the resource or the use of the resource

label: Subject Agent
desc: party that the resources contains information about

label: Subject Agent Representative
desc: party who can be contacted who best represents the interests of the subject agent

label: User
desc: party who uses the resource
